actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to assure that that Act applies to employees who are citizens of the United States employed by an employer in a workplace in a foreign country.

summary.text: Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to redefine the term "employee" to include Americans employed in a foreign workplace. Provides that the Act does not apply where the employer is a foreign person not controlled by an American employer.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to assure that that Act applies to employees who are citizens of the United States employed by an employer in a workplace in a foreign country.
